DEVICE_LIST.SWITCH_ON_ALL_LOCATION: Switch on all devices in this location
DEVICE_LIST.SWITCH_OFF_ALL_LOCATION: Switch off all devices in this location
DEVICE_LIST.SWITCH_ON_ALL_GROUP: Switch on all devices in this group
DEVICE_LIST.SWITCH_OFF_ALL_GROUP: Switch off all devices in this group
DEVICE_LIST.SWITCH_ON_ALL_TYPE: Switch on all devices of this type
DEVICE_LIST.SWITCH_OFF_ALL_TYPE: Switch off all devices of this type
